concept.title: Installing Additional Stages
concept.shortdesc: The includes a wide range of stages for pipeline development, but you might find a need for additional functionality. We have created additional stages that you can install and are working on more.

conbody.p:
stagesinstalling additionalinstallationadditional stagesAt this time, the following additional stages are available:
Description
Cloudera CDH version 5.3.1
Cloudera CDH version 5.3.0
Cloudera CDH version 5.2.1
Use to access the Cloudera distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Provides a Cloudera CDH origin and destination for the installed version.
Kafka version 0.8.2.0
Kafka version 0.8.1.1 Use to access Kafka clusters.
Provides a Kafka origin and destination for the installed version.
